org.nvonop.selenium.framework.datagenerator

Class DateGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nvonop.selenium.framework.datagenerator.DateGenerator

  • public class DateGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    nvonop This class is intended to be used for obtaining date data including dates in the future and in the past.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String getDateInFuture(int daysToAdd)
      This method calculates a future date based on today's date plus the amount of days specified and returns it as a String in the format dd/mm/yyyy.
      static java.lang.String getDateInPast(int daysToSubtract)
      This method calculates a past date based on today's date minus the amount of days specified and returns it as a String in the format dd/mm/yyyy.
      static java.lang.String getDayInFuture(int daysToAdd)
      This method calculates day for a future date based on today's date plus the amount of days specified and returns it as a String in the format dd.
      static java.lang.String getDayInPast(int daysToSubtract)
      This method calculates the day for a past date based on today's date minus the amount of days specified and returns it as a String in the format dd.
      static java.lang.String getMonthInFuture(int daysToAdd)
      This method calculates month for a future date based on today's date plus the amount of days specified and returns it as a String in the format mm.
      static java.lang.String getMonthInPast(int daysToSubtract)
      This method calculates month for a past date based on today's date minus the amount of days specified and returns it as a String in the format dd/mm/yyyy.
      static java.lang.String getTodaysDate()
      This method calculates the date at the point the method is called and returns it as a String in the format dd/mm/yyyy.
      static java.lang.String getTodaysDay()
      This method calculates the day at the point the method is called and returns it as a String in the format dd.
      static java.lang.String getTodaysMonth()
      This method calculates the month at the point the method is called and returns it as a String in the format MM.
      static java.lang.String getTodaysYear()
      This method calculates the year at the point the method is called and returns it as a String in the format yyyy.
      static java.lang.String getYearInFuture(int daysToAdd)
      This method calculates year for a future date based on today's date plus the amount of days specified and returns it as a String in the format dd/mm/yyyy.
      static java.lang.String getYearInPast(int daysToSubtract)
      This method calculates year for a past date based on today's date minus the amount of days specified and returns it as a String in the format yyyy.
